63596995b665ee94bf516b49b6e155c1: To submit a dental claim for a 23-year-old financially dependent daughter who recently married and changed her surname, you would need to update her last name in the policy records. This change should be communicated to the company in writing, and the change will be effective only when an endorsement on the policy is made. As for the company's grievance redressal email, you can contact them at csd@orientalinsurance.co.in
b9933ee81bee2bba3130968da041d804:
Supporting documents needed for the claim submission involving robotic surgery for a spouse at "Apollo Care Hospital" would include all documents duly attested by the Insured Person/Claimant, details of previous policies if not already with TPA, and any other information required by TPA/Company.

To confirm if "Apollo Care Hospital" is a network provider, you would need to check if the hospital is enlisted by an insurer, TPA, or jointly by an Insurer and TPA to provide medical services to an insured by a cashless facility. If the hospital is not part of the network, it would be considered a non-network provider.

Regarding the sibling above 26 continuing as a dependent after job loss, this information is not specified in the policy. It would be best to contact the Company/TPA directly to inquire about any possible exceptions or waivers in such cases
5c3b4bbeef1139b119f7e55f4b8980b9:
Maximum cashless hospitalization benefit for accidental trauma for a covered parent-in-law is not specified in the policy. 

The claim notification procedure for cashless access services in a network hospital/nursing home is as follows: The insured person must provide all relevant medical details to the Company/TPA, who will then issue a pre-authorization letter/guarantee of payment letter to the hospital/nursing home. The insured person can then obtain treatment as per their treating doctor's advice and submit full claim papers to the Company/TPA within 15 days of discharge for consideration.

To replace a lost ID card for another dependent, the card must be returned to the TPA at the insured's expense. The insured person agrees to hold harmless the Company and TPA against any costs, expenses, liabilities, and claims arising from the use or misuse of the ID card prior to its return
14847db8fbb32bf6f6728c003ae22576:
- Admission for psychiatric illness for a 17-year-old son to a hospital outside the city: Not specified in the policy.
- Request for address update for all family members: Not specified in the policy.
- Coverage for OPD dental checkups under Gold and Platinum plans: OPD benefit for dental checkups is available only for the Platinum plan, with a reimbursement of up to Rs. 5,000 in a block of every three years
ddd3fa903242f76c4006ce9d7f354a31:
To port a prior individual policy from another insurer for a dependent parent-in-law, the steps would include:
1. Ensure that the parent-in-law has been continuously covered without any lapses under any health insurance policy with an Indian General/Health insurer.
2. Refer to the IRDAI guidelines on portability for detailed instructions.
3. Contact the new insurer to initiate the porting process and provide all necessary documents and information.

For a post-hospitalization medicine claim for your child, the documents needed may include:
1. Medical prescription for the post-hospitalization medicines.
2. Original bills and receipts for the medicines purchased.
3. Any other relevant medical reports or documents related to the post-hospitalization treatment.

The toll-free customer service number for OICL Happy Family Floater Policy-2024 is not specified in the policy
91b476578015b1e462afdc0cce47b6b9: The expenses for arthritis treatment at home would not be covered if the insured person's condition was such that they could have been transferred to a hospital but chose to stay at home due to lack of hospital beds
63f1b14a7d515a8f5ce10e5fd07ef6c3: The prosthetic device after hip replacement surgery is payable. The lumbar belt post-discharge is also payable as per the policy. The walker is not specified in the policy, so it is "Not specified in the policy."
4681ab2004defb927c4b148278445dbe:
The claim for the insured's child's dental surgery after an accident would be admissible as the child falls within the age range of 18 to 26, is unemployed, unmarried, and dependent. However, the claim would need to be pre-authorized by the insurer before the treatment starts. The insured must send the following information prepared by the Dentist who will carry out the proposed treatment to the insurer before the treatment starts:
- Full description of the proposed treatment
- X-rays and study models
- An estimate of the cost of the treatment

The insurer will confirm the benefit that will be payable only if they have authorized the cover before the treatment starts
549d6c761347188d5c3594c03301d8f2:
The policyholder can add their newly-adopted child as a dependent by submitting an application for cover to the insurer. The insurer will assess the application and if accepted, additional premium on a pro-rata basis will be applied for the risk coverage duration of the child. An endorsement confirming the addition of the child as an Insured Person will be issued by the insurer.

The insurer may refuse cover for the child if the child is over 18 years old, married, employed, or not dependent on the policyholder. Additionally, if the insurer does not receive written notification of the adoption and agreed premium within the specified timeframe (last day of the month following the adoption), they may refuse cover for the child
0c2901e9c7d72601f3f52e4dda52c086: The official name of India according to Article 1 of the Constitution is "SOVEREIGN SOCIALIST SECULAR DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC."
114ae67c502946574257b45ca267be9b: "Untouchability" is abolished by Article 17 of the Constitution
198c759ecb2091f3050dec2a3aca67e2: The key ideals mentioned in the Preamble of the Constitution of India are Justice, Liberty, Equality, and Fraternity
fa11cf38df25e7d71f65d9c76d4b3ad8: Non-infective Arthritis is covered under the policy
5c7de706508a3e74708f6568055f92cc: Expenses towards lawful medical termination of pregnancy during the policy period are covered, unless due to an accident
c1c32e2718dfad7a2695338f458d26e7: The root canal claim of Rs 25,000 will be settled within 15 days from the date of receipt of the last necessary document
17ca2b86d8887d86ab7d87aca8ebf914: No, the cataract treatment expenses will be settled up to 25% of the Sum Insured or Rs. 40,000/-, whichever is lower, per eye, under one policy year
f8fe6cb8709c19b22c8cd8bbd5a93bba:
i. Duly completed claim form
ii. Photo Identity proof of the patient
iii. Medical practitioner’s prescription advising admission.
iv. Original bills with itemized break-up
v. Payment receipts
vi. Discharge summary including complete medical history of the patient along with other details.
vii. Investigation/ Diagnostic test reports etc. supported by the prescription from attending medical practitioner
viii. OT notes or Surgeon's certificate giving details of the operation performed (for surgical cases).
ix. Sticker/Invoice of the Implants, wherever applicable.
x. MLR (Medico Legal Report copy if carried out and FIR (First information report) if registered, where ever applicable.
xi. NEFT Details (to enable direct credit of claim amount in bank account) and cancelled cheque
xii. KYC (Identity proof with Address) of the proposer, where claim liability is above Rs. 1 Lakh as per AML Guidelines
xiii. Legal heir/succession certificate, wherever applicable
xiv. Any other relevant document required by Company/TPA for assessment of the claim
266f3c99e9e0a5021a4dd950ee5a3e09: Newton defines quantity of motion as the measure arising from the velocity and quantity of matter combined. It is distinct from force, which he defines as the innate power of matter to resist changes in motion
9905d60d0cc1695e5c43ad6e656db5fe: Newton defines 'quantity of motion' as the product of a body's mass and velocity (momentum). It differs from 'force', which causes changes in motion.
db02fffc0f0b0874b87037c4bebb4a06: Newton's laws—1) inertia, 2) F=ma, 3) action-reaction—explain celestial mechanics by showing how gravity provides the centripetal force for planetary motion.
c44c65686e771aa414fc9a0a6ab03006: Newton derives Kepler's Second Law by showing that a planet swept equal areas in equal times due to the conservation of angular momentum under a central gravitational force.
5d5e3ca478270c04399becdd65b5d6b4: He showed that a force causing elliptical planetary orbits must decrease with the square of the distance, using geometric proofs and planetary data.
c6801b6de837ca42ab35dd8f3c06c8d1: Newton argued that all matter exerts gravitational force to maintain observed celestial motions, implying gravity acts universally on all masses.
63e63d5c95901fc844746650576212be: Newton explained orbital perturbations as the result of gravitational interactions between multiple bodies, using approximations and geometric analysis.
61e2ba304165a59fda8b0058e5e521f4: He used geometric limits and fluxions (his version of calculus), avoiding standard calculus notation due to its lack of formalization at the time.
7edc7c0214007ade44d116e631fd163a: Newton showed that centripetal force directed at the center of motion keeps planets in orbit, matching gravitational attraction with orbital velocity.
8dcdc74b2e7c311b0e8d197a8eee166e: Newton modeled resisting media by adding drag forces proportional to velocity or velocity squared, showing their effect on slowing motion over time.
ce5907e3b05862072fc42d74548269bc: He proposed absolute space and time as fixed frameworks, independent of objects, to define true motion and validate his laws objectively.
7236708a434957b041d64feaa4466006: Isaac Newton's paternal grandfather was also named Isaac Newton.
56e0a215f25af7a5027ef890bc4e900c: Newton had no children or direct descendants; he remained unmarried and had no known lineage beyond his grandparents.
6a2f285c4c470f736325669f9cb2c63e: Children below the age of fourteen years are prohibited from working in hazardous industries like factories or mines
bb0e00eea00cd1be4ffc879380a11f5d: Article 21 of the Indian Constitution guarantees the right to life and personal liberty
9f446e0edd96f850c151ede19a22cc12: The State can make special provisions for the advancement of economically weaker sections of citizens other than the classes mentioned in clauses (4) and (5) under Article 15
6a17089f53ede02ffb9491bed4228675: Article 11 allows Parliament to regulate the right of citizenship and override previous articles on citizenship (Articles 5 to 10)
ca09ad1ca5923c42e1919ae2f1a75403: Front and rear tyres are specified as tubeless tyres in the context provided
